title: mypet宠物插件怎么补抓凋零和僵尸马以及僵尸马呢？
author: D_xuehen
txt_content:
mypet宠物插件如何补抓僵尸马骷颅马
召唤出来驯服的悬绳补抓不了直接打死了...

replies.author: 空桑i了
replies.txt_content: 你的宠物插件config文件确认一下是否允许捕捉这俩货

replies.author: D_xuehen
replies.txt_content:
绫岚_ 发表于 2019-7-12 09:35
你的宠物插件config文件确认一下是否允许捕捉这俩货
MyPet:
  Leash:
    Consume: false
  OwnerCanAttackPet: false
  DisablePetVersusPlayer: false
  RemovePetsAfterRelease: false
  FollowStartDistance: 7.0
  ReleasePetsOnDeath: false
  RetainEquipmentOnTame: true
  Make-Pet-Invisible-When-Owner-Is-Invisible: true
